Class MakeLanes
In: ../lsgmake-gap.rb
Parent: Object

submit jobs, one per lane

Usage

   MakeLanes.lanes(4..8)
   job_name_base = 'myrun'
   slx = MakeLanes.new(job_name_base, 's_%I')
   slx.submit or puts "failed to submit #{job_name_base}"
   job = slx.job_name
